body:
I am now convinced that these failures are the symptom of a kernel bug that was fixed by https://github.com/torvalds/linux/commit/723cacbd9dc79582e562c123a0bacf8bfc69e72a (backported to SLES 12 SP1 [here](http://kernel.suse.com/cgit/kernel/commit/?h=SLE12-SP1&id=b8ddd641dff71d443d98142e9ab49d57f422c1ce)).

I've updated the builder to `3.12.62-60.62-default #1 SMP Thu Aug 4 09:06:08 UTC 2016 (b0e5a26)` and it now appears to be passing the runtime tests reliably (1000 runs, normally enough to see the problem many times).

I suggest closing this issue for now and reopening if we see the problem again.
